let's get into the economic collapse

and what we've been seeing is that the

because remember throughout this entire

and they never had an individual or a

was like
the central bank they knew what it was

hadn't had anyone to really counter

the Federal Reserve no one really

when we had the crash in 2008 they

it's all the people's fault it was

back then told us that we were not

which were not allowed to know where

of course it was all for the betterment

they never expected Trump to contradict

Trump is pointing the finger at the Fed
at what has been going on for a very

I know the central bank right now
they're trying to explain away how rates

remember this is not a free market where

they're one of the largest auto

all of a sudden the United States is
